children.value: This tutorial explains how to analyze Cloudflare metrics using the
Before viewing the Cloudflare dashboard in Datadog, note that this integration:
Is available to all Cloudflare customer plans (Free, Pro, Business and Enterprise)
Provides Cloudflare web traffic and DNS metrics only
Does not feature data coming from request logs stored in Cloudflare Logs
To install the Cloudflare App for Datadog:
. The app tile should appear below the search box.

children.alt: Datadog Integrations search for Cloudflare App

children.value: : (Optional) This can be any value. It has not impact on the site data pulled from Cloudflare.
: This value helps keep your account safe. We recommend creating a dedicated Cloudflare user for analytics with the
role is available to Enterprise customers only.
: Enter your Cloudflare Global API key.
The Cloudflare App for Datadog should be installed now and you can view the dashboard.
By default, the dashboard displays metrics for all sites in your Cloudflare account. Use the dashboard filters see metrics for a specific domain.
The dashboard displays the following metrics:
(total requests, cached requests, uncached requests, top countries by request, requests by IP class, top content types)
(total bandwidth, encrypted and unencrypted traffic cached bandwidth, uncached bandwidth)
(Cache hit rate, request caching rate over time)
(DNS queries, response time, top hostnames, queries by type, stale vs. uncached queries)
